summary: japanese photographer yûki aoyama 's latest series of images capture po-faced teenagers pictured next to their fathers leaping into the air . in each picture the daughter looks directly into the camera smiling while her father pulls a dramatic pose . the images are from the 37-year-old 's latest book which roughly translates into daughter and salary man .

To provide an understanding or description of a central concept or theme.

Keywords: Yûki Aoyama, father-daughter pairs, fathers leaping into the air, central concept

In this context, "The series is part of a book titled 'Daughter and Salary Man'" refers to the fact that the collection of photographs by Japanese photographer Yûki Aoyama included in the book revolve around the relationship and dynamics between fathers who work as salarymen and their daughters. The book presents an artistic exploration of this relationship, shedding light on the complexities, emotions, and moments shared between these characters.

The aspect states that the fathers in the photographs by Japanese photographer Yûki Aoyama wear suits, while their daughters wear casual clothing. This contrast between the attire of the father and daughter reflects the generational difference in their lifestyles and values. The suits worn by the fathers symbolize their professional lives, while the casual clothing worn by the daughters indicates their more relaxed and youthful personas. This contrast underscores the idea of the modern-day "salaryman" and the younger generation, who may have different aspirations and perspectives on life.
